00014 extern StringAnalPulseMap gAnalysedPulseMap;
00015 static int nSec;            // Number of sections in the silicon thin detectors
00016 static TH2D* hEvdE[2];      // Histograms (right, left)
00017 static TH1D* hEvdE_log[2];

00019 static TH2D* hEvdEprotons[2];

00021 EvdE::EvdE(char *HistogramDirectoryName):FillHistBase(HistogramDirectoryName) 
00022 {;}

00024 EvdE::EvdE(char *HistogramDirectoryName, double t0, double t1) :
00025         FillHistBase(HistogramDirectoryName) 
00026 {
00027         // Thin silicon is in quadrants
00028         nSec = 4;
00029         // Time in ns
00030         tCoincidence = 1000.;
00031         tPP = 10000.;
00032         tStart = t0;
00033         tStop = t1;
00034         // Energy cuts in ADC
00035         adcCutThick[0] = 80.;
00036         adcCutThick[1] = 80.;
00037         adcCutThin[0] = 160.;
00038         adcCutThin[1] = 160.;
00039         eCutThin[0] = adcCutThin[0] * 2.6;
00040         eCutThin[1] = adcCutThin[1] * 2.6;
00041 
00042         slopeThick[0] = 8.06;
00043         offsetThick[0] = -192.70;
00044         slopeThick[1] = 7.93;
00045         offsetThick[1] = -116.33;
00046 
00047         slopeThin[0][0] = 2.57;
00048         offsetThin[0][0] = -87.96;
00049         slopeThin[0][1] = 2.72;
00050         offsetThin[0][1] = -292.15;
00051         slopeThin[0][2] = 2.52;
00052         offsetThin[0][2] = -30.19;
00053         slopeThin[0][3] = 2.57;
00054         offsetThin[0][3] = -103.67;
00055 
00056         slopeThin[1][0] = 2.66;
00057         offsetThin[1][0] = -117.34;
00058         slopeThin[1][1] = 2.56;
00059         offsetThin[1][1] = -44.45;
00060         slopeThin[1][2] = 2.68;
00061         offsetThin[1][2] = -129.73;
00062         slopeThin[1][3] = 2.58;
00063         offsetThin[1][3] = -85.48;
00064 
00065         // Prepare histograms
00066         hEvdE[0] = new TH2D("hEvdE_Right", "dEdx vs E (Right);E + dE (keV);dE (keV)",
00067                         1000, 0., 14000.,
00068                         500, 0., 7000.);
00069         hEvdE[1] = new TH2D("hEvdE_Left", "dEdx vs E (Left);E + dE (keV);dE (keV)",
00070                         1000, 0., 14000.,
00071                         500, 0., 7000.);
00072 
00073         hEvdE_log[0] = new TH1D("hEvdE_Right_log", "logdE +logE (Right)", 100, 10., 30.);
00074         hEvdE_log[1] = new TH1D("hEvdE_Left_log", "logdE +logE (Left)", 100, 10., 30.);
00075 
00076         hEprotons[1] = new TH1D("hEp_Left", 
00077                         "Energy of protons (Left)", 1000, 0., 14000.);
00078         hEprotons[0] = new TH1D("hEp_Right", 
00079                         "Energy of protons (Right)", 1000, 0., 14000.);
00080 
00081         hEvdEprotons[0] = new TH2D("hEvdE_Proton_Right", "dEdx vs E (Right);E + dE (keV);dE (keV)",
00082                         1000, 0., 14000.,
00083                         500, 0., 7000.);
00084         hEvdEprotons[1] = new TH2D("hEvdE_Proton_Left", "dEdx vs E (Left);E + dE (keV);dE (keV)",
00085                         1000, 0., 14000.,
00086                         500, 0., 7000.);
00087 
00088         gDirectory->cd("/");
00089 }

00093 
00094 int EvdE::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup) {
00095 
00096         // Look for muSc and at least one arm
00097         static AnalysedPulseList *musc;
00098         static AnalysedPulseList *sirThin[4], *silThin[4];
00099         static AnalysedPulseList *sirThick, *silThick;
00100         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("muSc")) musc = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("muSc");
00101         else return 0;
00102 
00103         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiR1-1-S")) sirThin[0] = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiR1-1-S");
00104         else sirThin[0] = NULL;
00105         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiR1-2-S")) sirThin[1] = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiR1-2-S");
00106         else sirThin[1] = NULL;
00107         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiR1-3-S")) sirThin[2] = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiR1-3-S");
00108         else sirThin[2] = NULL;
00109         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiR1-4-S")) sirThin[3] = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiR1-4-S");
00110         else sirThin[3] = NULL;
00111 
00112         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiL1-1-S")) silThin[0] = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiL1-1-S");
00113         else silThin[0] = NULL;
00114         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiL1-2-S")) silThin[1] = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiL1-2-S");
00115         else silThin[1] = NULL;
00116         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiL1-3-S")) silThin[2] = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiL1-3-S");
00117         else silThin[2] = NULL;
00118         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiL1-4-S")) silThin[3] = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiL1-4-S");
00119         else silThin[3] = NULL;
00120 
00121         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiR2-S")) sirThick = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiR2-S");
00122         else sirThick = NULL;
00123 
00124         if (gAnalysedPulseMap.count("SiL2-S")) silThick = &gAnalysedPulseMap.at("SiL2-S");
00125         else silThick = NULL;
00126 
00127         // If there's nothing logical to get data from, don't bother analysing
00128         if (!(sirThick && (sirThin[0] || sirThin[1] || sirThin[2] || sirThin[3])) &&
00129                         !(silThick && (silThin[0] || silThin[1] || silThin[2] || silThin[3])))
00130                 return 0;
00131 
00132 
00133         // Iterators through aforementioned vectors
00134         static int iSec;
00135         static AnalysedPulseList::iterator cMusc;
00136         static AnalysedPulseList::iterator cSiRThick, cSiLThick;
00137         static AnalysedPulseList::iterator cSiRThin[4], cSiLThin[4];
00138         cMusc = musc->begin();
00139         if (sirThick)
00140                 cSiRThick = sirThick->begin();
00141         if (silThick)
00142                 cSiLThick = silThick->begin();
00143         for (iSec = 0; iSec < nSec; ++iSec) 
00144         {
00145                 if (sirThin[iSec]) 
00146                         cSiRThin[iSec] = (sirThin[iSec])->begin();
00147 
00148                 if (silThin[iSec])
00149                         cSiLThin[iSec] = (silThin[iSec])->begin();
00150         }
00151 
00152         static double tMusc;
00153         static std::vector<double> tSiRThick, tSiLThick;
00154         static std::vector<double> eSiRThick, eSiLThick;
00155         static unsigned int iHit, nThickHits;
00156 
00157         for (; cMusc != musc->end(); ++cMusc) 
00158         {
00159                 tMusc = (*cMusc)->GetTime();
00160                 tSiRThick.clear(); tSiLThick.clear();
00161                 eSiRThick.clear(); eSiLThick.clear();
00162                 // If there's pile-up, advance beyond it
00163                 if ((cMusc+1) != musc->end() && ((*(cMusc + 1))->GetTime() - tMusc) < tPP) 
00164                 {
00165                         ++cMusc;
00166                         continue;
00167                 }
00168 
00169                 // Advance silicon pulses beyond time of muSc
00170                 if (sirThick)
00171                         while (cSiRThick != sirThick->end() 
00172                                         && ((*cSiRThick)->GetTime() < (tMusc + tStart)))
00173                                 ++cSiRThick;
00174 
00175                 if (silThick)
00176                         while ((cSiLThick != silThick->end()) 
00177                                         && ((*cSiLThick)->GetTime() < tMusc + tStart))
00178                                 ++cSiLThick;
00179 
00180                 for (iSec = 0; iSec < nSec; ++iSec) 
00181                 {
00182                         if (sirThin[iSec])
00183                                 while (cSiRThin[iSec] != sirThin[iSec]->end() 
00184                                                 && ((*(cSiRThin[iSec]))->GetTime() < tMusc + tStart))
00185                                         ++(cSiRThin[iSec]);
00186 
00187                         if (silThin[iSec])
00188                                 while (cSiLThin[iSec] != silThin[iSec]->end() 
00189                                                 && ((*(cSiLThin[iSec]))->GetTime() < tMusc + tStart))
00190                                         ++(cSiLThin[iSec]);
00191                 }
00192 
00193                 // Check for hits
00194                 // Look for hits in thick detectors first
00195                 if (sirThick) // If there was at least one hit in the thick detector
00196                 {
00197                         while (cSiRThick != sirThick->end() 
00198                                         && (((*cSiRThick)->GetTime() - tMusc) < tStop)) // Look for hits in the decay window after muSc hit
00199                         { 
00200                                 if ((*cSiRThick)->GetEnergy() > adcCutThick[0]) 
00201                                 {// If a hit passes the amplitude cut
00202                                         tSiRThick.push_back((*cSiRThick)->GetTime()); // Save the time
00203                                         eSiRThick.push_back((*cSiRThick)->GetEnergy()); // And the amplitude
00204                                 }
00205                                 ++cSiRThick;
00206                         }
00207                 }
00208 
00209                 if (silThick) 
00210                 {
00211                         while (cSiLThick != silThick->end() 
00212                                         && (((*cSiLThick)->GetTime() - tMusc < tStop))) 
00213                         {
00214                                 if ((*cSiLThick)->GetEnergy() > adcCutThick[1]) 
00215                                 {
00216                                         tSiLThick.push_back((*cSiLThick)->GetTime());
00217                                         eSiLThick.push_back((*cSiLThick)->GetEnergy());
00218                                 }
00219                                 ++cSiLThick;
00220                         }
00221                 }
00222 
00223                 if (tSiRThick.size() > 0) // If there was at least one hit in the thick window
00224                 {
00225                         nThickHits = tSiRThick.size();
00226                         for (iHit = 0; iHit < nThickHits; ++iHit) 
00227                         {// Loop through the times of all of the hits
00228                                 double dE = 0.; // Keep track of energy
00229                                 for (iSec = 0; iSec < nSec; ++iSec)// Loop through all the sections of the thin silicon 
00230                                 {
00231                                         if (sirThin[iSec]) 
00232                                         {// And, if there are hits in this thin detector
00233                                                 while ((cSiRThin[iSec] != sirThin[iSec]->end()) &&
00234                                                                 (*(cSiRThin[iSec]))->GetTime() < (tSiRThick[iHit] - tCoincidence))  // Catch the iterator up to the beginning of the time window
00235                                                         ++(cSiRThin[iSec]);
00236 
00237                                                 while (cSiRThin[iSec] != sirThin[iSec]->end() &&
00238                                                                 (*(cSiRThin[iSec]))->GetTime() < tSiRThick[iHit] + tCoincidence) 
00239                                                 { // And look for hits in this window
00240                                                         dE += offsetThin[0][iSec] +                             // Increment the energy
00241                                                                 ((*(cSiRThin[iSec]))->GetEnergy())*slopeThin[0][iSec];
00242                                                         ++(cSiRThin[iSec]);
00243                                                 }
00244                                         }
00245                                 }
00246                                 if (dE> eCutThin[0])                                                      // If the energy is greater than our cut
00247                                 {
00248                                         double E = eSiRThick[iHit]*slopeThick[0] + offsetThick[0] + dE;
00249                                         hEvdE[0]->Fill(E, dE);// Record total energy deposited in thin detector
00250                                         hEvdE_log[0]->Fill(log(E) + log(dE));
00251                                         if ((log(E) + log(dE) >14.5) && (log(E) + log(dE)<15.6))
00252                                         {
00253                                                 hEprotons[0]->Fill(E);
00254                                                 hEvdEprotons[0]->Fill(E, dE);
00255                                         }
00256                                 }
00257                         }
00258                 }
00259 
00260                 if (tSiLThick.size() > 0) 
00261                 {
00262                         nThickHits = tSiLThick.size();
00263                         for (iHit = 0; iHit < nThickHits; ++iHit) 
00264                         {
00265                                 double dE = 0.;
00266                                 for (iSec = 0; iSec < nSec; ++iSec) 
00267                                 {
00268                                         if (silThin[iSec]) {
00269                                                 while (cSiLThin[iSec] != silThin[iSec]->end() &&
00270                                                                 (*(cSiLThin[iSec]))->GetTime() < (tSiLThick[iHit]-tCoincidence))
00271                                                         ++(cSiLThin[iSec]);
00272 
00273                                                 while (cSiLThin[iSec] != silThin[iSec]->end() &&
00274                                                                 (*(cSiLThin[iSec]))->GetTime() < tSiLThick[iHit] + tCoincidence) 
00275                                                 {
00276                                                         dE += offsetThin[1][iSec] +                             // Increment the energy
00277                                                                 ((*(cSiLThin[iSec]))->GetEnergy())*slopeThin[1][iSec];
00278                                                         ++(cSiLThin[iSec]);
00279                                                 }
00280                                         }
00281                                 }
00282                                 if (dE > eCutThin[1])
00283                                 {
00284                                         double E = eSiLThick[iHit]*slopeThick[1] + offsetThick[1] + dE;
00285                                         hEvdE[1]->Fill(E, dE);
00286                                         hEvdE_log[1]->Fill(log(E) + log(dE));
00287                                         if ((log(E) + log(dE) >14.5) && (log(E) + log(dE)<15.6))
00288                                         {
00289                                                 hEprotons[1]->Fill(E);
00290                                                 hEvdEprotons[1]->Fill(E, dE);
00291                                         }
00292                                 }
00293                         }
00294                 }
00295         }
00296         return 0;
00297 }
